heading: 1 Introduction
text:
website serves repository data management SOPs used
within Northwestern University Mesulam Center Cognitive Neurology &
Alzheimer’s Disease.

heading: 1.1 How to Use the Site
text:
Navigate SOPs Table contents left panel. Navigate chapters
within SOP right panel. Search specific SOP using search
bar located Table contents left panel.

heading: 1.1.1 Navigating Pages
text:
Navigate next SOP clicking next page button bottom 
text.Navigate previous SOP clicking previous page button 
bottom text.

heading: 2.6 Documenting the Data Request
text: purpose data documentation Data Request explain everything done. include:data pulled – databases used; specify data pulled via REDCap report, API, method.data pulled – variables pulled database.done data pulled – additional filtering sorting, adding comments/variables, calculations, etc.. documentation consists sentences short paragraphs, can entered directly Data Request Form Documentation textbox.B. documentation requires longer explanation, create word document paste link documentation Data Request Form Documentation textbox.

text:
Fill function allows user specify criteria fill cells
missing data. useful tool certain information one
row data, needs entered rows Global ID,
PTID, name, etc. Starting data look something like : data certain columns 
missing specific rows. example, stub information might appear
stub events visit rows data. information
filled using fill function.Select column need fill. Press ‘Ctrl + G’ ‘Go ’ pop-
window Excel. Select ‘Special…’. new pop-window appear. Select
‘Blanks’ press OK. empty cells highlighted.
formula bar, enter formula matches necessary criteria 
fill cell.
example, formula saying “id 
cell 1-4 (1003) equal id 
cell 1-5 (1003), current cell
equals sex cell 2-4 (Male). Else,
leave current cell blank (id cell 1-4 equal id cell 1-5).”

participant, use following statement formula bar
(highlighting cells accordingly):

=((global_id_cell_1=
global_id_cell_2,
ptid_cell_1=
ptid_cell_2),
sex_cell_1,””)
statement saying plain English: 
global id cell 1 equals 
global id cell 2 
ptid cell 1 equals 
ptid cell 2, current cell equals 
sex cell 1. Else, leave current cell
blank (global ids, ptids, rows).
